# <code>math product</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>Finds the product of a list of numbers or tables</div>

## Signature

```> math product```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Get the product of a list of numbers
```shell
  > [2 3 3 4] | math product
```
